Sentencas: An alternative oxide anode material to surpass Ni electrode in the solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) technology, used at high temperature range (500-1000 degrees C), is needed for the SOFC industry.
Titulo: A non-redoxable electron-cloud-channel oxide electrode: Atmosphere independent metallic perovskite CaVxO3-d

Sentencas: We investigated an advanced perovskite oxide electrode, CaVxO3-delta system, for the alternative oxide anode material.
Titulo: A non-redoxable electron-cloud-channel oxide electrode: Atmosphere independent metallic perovskite CaVxO3-d

Sentencas: The CaVxO3-delta powder and bulk were fabricated by using an atmosphere controlled solid-state reaction method and spark plasma sintering (SPS), respectively.
Titulo: A non-redoxable electron-cloud-channel oxide electrode: Atmosphere independent metallic perovskite CaVxO3-d

Sentencas: The bulk specimen showed 3-3 type nonstoichiometric composite structure, and the electrical conductivity and Seebeck coefficient measurements revealed metallic n-type conductivity.
Titulo: A non-redoxable electron-cloud-channel oxide electrode: Atmosphere independent metallic perovskite CaVxO3-d

Sentencas: Surprisingly, the high electrical conductivity (> 12,000 S/cm at room temperature; > 100 0 S/cm at 1000 K) was stable at different atmospheres between air and reduction atmospheres, attributing to a non-redoxable electron-cloud-channel phase protected by a redoxable protection phase.
Titulo: A non-redoxable electron-cloud-channel oxide electrode: Atmosphere independent metallic perovskite CaVxO3-d

Sentencas: It is believed that the CaVxO3-delta system can be used as a promising and atmosphere stable oxide electrode in the fuel cell technology and other applications.
Titulo: A non-redoxable electron-cloud-channel oxide electrode: Atmosphere independent metallic perovskite CaVxO3-d
